text: Journeyman was an American science-fiction television series on the NBC network. It started in September 2007. == Plot == The series is about a reporter, Dan Vasser, who finds that he can travel through time with no warning. He can change things in his own past, so he has to be careful not to change too much. == Other websites == * Official NBC site * Category:American science fiction television series Category:NBC network series Category:American drama television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Journeyman (TV series)
